rule: The chatbot must accurately determine the most appropriate category based on the content of the input text without relying on provided examples.
input: New financial regulations aim to stabilize the banking sector.
validityText:
The input provided is a single sentence that resembles a news headline. However, according to the input specification, the input must be the text of a complete news article suitable for classification into one of the specified categories. A complete news article typically consists of multiple sentences or paragraphs providing detailed information, background, and context, which the given input lacks.
ERR
